Hope is Alive

Centre Pointe Church is a new start church located in Ashland, Kentucky launching March 2017.

Get Connected

Who we are

← Swipe →

Know God

We love modern worship music and great biblical teaching that we can apply to our daily lives...and you can expect to find both at CPC during our Sunday experiences.

Come as you are. Come expecting God to move. Come ready to see our community forever changed.

(Matthew 7:21-23) “Not everyone who says to me, ‘Lord, Lord,’ will enter the kingdom of heaven, but only he who does the will of my Father who is in heaven. Many will say to me on that day, ‘Lord, Lord, did we not prophesy in your name, and in your name drive out demons and perform many miracles?’ Then I will tell them plainly, ‘I never knew you.’”

Find Freedom

We believe that life is better together. We were not created to be isolated and "do life" on our own. We believe in Life Groups where people can come together, become family, and see God do a work in their lives.

(James 5:16) Therefore confess your sins to each other and pray for each other so that you may be healed.

Discover Purpose

God has an incredible purpose for your life, and the CentrePointe Growth Track is designed to help you connect with that purpose. On the Growth Track, you will spend four Sundays diving into what it looks like to follow Jesus, connect to the church, discover your purpose and then make a difference with your life.

  • 101 Membership
  • 201 Essentials – How to have a vibrant relationship with Christ
  • 301 Discovery – understanding our design
  • 401 Dream Team – First service opportunity
(Ephesians 4:7-13) (Romans 12:6) We have different gifts, according to the grace given to each of us.

Make a Difference

We want you to be involved with serving...and we have a place for YOU! There is no greater joy to be experienced than the joy of making a difference. It’s about people achieving a Glory that outweighs the cares of life. It‘s about doing something eternal.

(1 Peter 4:10 NLT) God has given gifts to each of you from his great variety of spiritual gifts. Manage them well so that God’s generosity can flow through you.

Leadership

For the past 7 years, Zach and Jana Daniels have served in full time ministry with several great churches across the United States. During that time, God laid on their heart the desire to plant a church in Zach‘s hometown of Ashland, KY. The decision to finally make the move back to the Bluegrass State didn't happen until the summer of 2016.

While there are many churches in the tri-state area of Ashland, KY and surrounding communities, there are even more unchurched people. Their passion is not just to create a church where those folks will want attend, but where they will connect with God and have a desire to become a devoted follower of Christ. A community of believers who believe that Jesus is the hope for the world, where the broken are healed, the lost are found, and the captive are set free.

Give

Help us share that HOPE IS ALIVE and God is wanting to do great things through the local church and people of Ashland, Kentucky. Consider giving today!
